___StatusInfo.description: URLs of web pages providing additional information

___ContactID.description: The IDs of Contacts for this Service

___ShareID.description: The IDs of the Shares offered by this Service

___Complexity.description: A human-readable description of the number of endpoint types, shares, and resources

___ManagerID.description: The IDs of the Managers of this Service

___ServiceID.description: The IDs of Services related to this Service

___LocationID.description: The ID of the primary Location of this Service

___EndpointID.description: The IDs of Endpoints for this Service
